text: Joshua Brewster Bolten (born August 16, 1954) was the White House Chief of Staff serving U.S. President George W. Bush. Bolten replaced Andrew Card on April 14, 2006. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:White House Chiefs of Staff Category:Directors of the Office of Management and Budget Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Joshua Bolten
